name: make-react-native-package
description: CLI tool for bootstrapping react-native packages with Kotlin & Swift & Typescript

scripts.test: npm run test:scaffold-mock && npm run test:ts && npm run test:kotlin && npm run test:swift && npm run test:cleanup
scripts.test:scaffold-mock: ./index.js -p mock-package -g mock-user -w -c FakeComponent component-doodle -m falseModule dummy_module
scripts.test:ts: cd mock-package && npm run ci:build && npm run ci:lint:ts
scripts.test:kotlin: cd mock-package && npm run ci:lint:kotlin && npm run ci:compile:android
scripts.test:swift: cd mock-package && npm run ci:lint:swift && npm run ci:compile:ios

author: iyegoroff <iegoroff@gmail.com>
